price: el cual está registrado en la Escritura Matriz junto a Mí, y es [el Corán un Libro] sublime y sabio.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
